comments.html:
This time, it's hard to blame them -- the filters are clearly marked as "set operations" and that would imply they're using sets.

Expecting a typical server/network admin to know that Python sets are unordered is a different story 🤷‍♂️
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Sadly the quality of Ansible hasn’t progressed in the direction that I had hoped…
comments.name: Sander Steffann
